pr_title: Fix twitter itest so it initially waits when start polling tweets

timeline.bodyText: This will prolong the test execution by 1 min even if the message appears in the timeline much earlier. Wouldn't it be better to increase the number of retries? Or wouldn't some shorter initialDelayMs work too? like 10 seconds?
timeline.author: ppalaga

replies.bodyText:
@ppalaga Yes, in ideal world, it would be much better, but with such approach it leads to
429:Returned in API v1.1 when a request cannot be served due to the application's rate limit having been exhausted for the resource. See Rate Limiting in API v1.1.(https://dev.twitter.com/docs/rate-limiting/1.1)
replies.author: llowinge
